command_request module¶

command_request.main()¶

Main code for command recognition

Expects for the user to write the command ‘play’ or ‘stop’ to

‘play’ will ask for coordinates in order to make the ball appear in the environment ‘stop’ will make the ball dissapear of the environment

Publishers:
pub: publishes (std_msgs.String) to /command
